idea:
Instant Mudra is a Fintech Organisation incorporated in May 2019, by the industry veterans with over 19+ years of expertise in Payment industry with a vision to serve the Un-banked and under banked community based on Financial Inclusion programme and Domestic Money Transfer Model run by Reserve Bank Of India(RBI).

The company aims on providing online platform (Web and Mobile Application) which can help retailers to provide end to end financial services products to the masses through its well massive Cloud infrastructure.

Instant Mudra is highly equipped and has full control over our product development road-map. This also makes us nimble and able to rapidly roll out new features.
name: INSTANT MUDRA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are 4 travel professionals having more than 2 decades of Individual Travel Domain Experience specialised into MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences & Exhibitions / Events), Special Interest Groups (Hobby Tours like Bike Riding, Scuba Diving, Photography, Adventure Activities, Sports Events etc), Enterprise Travel (Medical Congresses, Trade Events / Conferences), would like to foray into Domestic (Within India), Inbound (Foriegners / NRI's Visiting India), Outbound and Cultural Tours etc with Offline & Online Presence having its head office at Mumbai, Maharashtra

idea:
·         We Founder Circle is a global community of successful founders & strategic angels, who wants to actively collaborate with early-stage startups to help them grow fast by offering seed funding, business development, and global networking.


·         The entire approach is digital first that enables angles across the globe, invest & partner with startups.


·         WFC aims to on-board global partners including VC funds, accelerators & founders communities from Indian, US, China, Singapore & European regions.
name: WE FOUNDER CIRCLE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are miniaturizing aquaculture, and taking it to the backyards of low-income households. We design and build small scale, precision aquaculture production systems with sub-systems for sensor-based water quality monitoring and forwarding the sensor data to their machine learning algorithm, to generate data driven, actionable insights. We are incubated at Start-up Incubation and Innovation Centre- IIT Kanpur, and at Atal Incubation Centre- Rambhau Mhalgi Prabodhini, Mumbai.
name: PROJECT SAJAL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are ready to supply diesel for stationary equipment like generator sets, earth moving equipment, heavy machineries used in construction sites, mobile towers, etc. and these may not have facility / resource to store HSD.
